message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be valuable to you. My initial offer is $20000 for the product.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my needs. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, based on my budget constraints, I am offering $15000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. While I understand your budget constraints, I must respectfully decline. I believe the product is worth more to you than what you've offered. My counteroffer is $18000 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand the value you see in the product, but I need to stick to my budget. I am willing to pay $16000 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer, Bob. After further consideration, I believe we can reach an agreement. My counteroffer is $17000 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I am willing to pay $16500 for the product. This is my final offer within my budget.
Thank you for your final offer, Bob. I appreciate your commitment to the product. My counteroffer is $16750 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am willing to pay $16500 for the product. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. My final counteroffer for the product is $16625.
Thank you for your final counteroffer, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am willing to pay $16500 for the product. This is my final offer.
